author: cmpilato
msg: Tweak the way we crawl for changelist members in the 'svn update' and
'svn status' functions.  This makes them basically do the right thing
without allowing changelist functionality down into their core APIs.
But it brings costs that weren't there before, such as ignoring the
order in which the user specifies targets to those subcommands.  The
right thing to do is to pass the list of changelists down into the
update and status APIs as we've done with the other changelist-using
subcommands.  So that's where I'll go next.
(svn_cl__update): Honor the --depth flag when crawling for
(svn_cl__status): Honor the --depth flag when crawling for
